blog_posts.title: All I Want For Xmas Is A User-Friendly JSON Editor
blog_posts.content:
Dear Santa,
I hope this finds you well. Say hello to Rudolph and The Missus for me.
 Anyways, can you make my xmas wish come true? Just make editing JSON less painful. Automatic quote insertion would be nice, for instance.
